label: Elixir of Health
effects: When drunk, it cures any disease; removed blinded, deafened, paralyzed, and poisoned conditions.

label: Oil of Etherealness
effects: The vial has enough oil to cover a medium or smaller creature; 10 minutes to apply. Creature gains the effect of the etherealness spell for 1 hour.

label: Oil of Sharpness
effects: The vial has enough oil to coat one slashing or piercing weapon or up to 5 pieces of ammunition; 1 minute to apply. The coated item has a +3 bonus to attack and damage rolls for 1 hour.

label: Oil of Slipperiness
effects: The vial has enough oil to cover a medium or smaller creature; 10 minutes to apply. Creature gains the effect of a freedom of movement spell for 8 hours. The oil can be poured on the ground covering a 10-foot square, creating the grease spell effect for 8 hours.

label: Philter of Love
effects: The creature that drinks this potion will become charmed by the next creature it sees within 10 minutes for a duration of 1 hour.

label: Potion of Animal Friendship
effects: When drunk, a creature can perform the animal friendship spell (save DC 13) for 1 hour at will.

label: Potion of Clairvoyance
effects: When drunk, a creature gains the effect of the clairvoyance spell.

label: Potion of Climbing
effects: When drunk, a creature gains a climbing speed equivalent to its walking speed for 1 hour and gains advantage on Strength (Athletics) checks made to climb.

label: Potion of Cloud Giant Strength
effects: When drunk, a creature's Strength score is increased to 27 for 1 hour.

label: Potion of Diminution
effects: When drunk, a creature gains the "reduce" effect of the enlarge/reduce spell for 1d4 hours (no concentration required).

label: Potion of Healing
effects: When drunk, a creature regains 2d4 + 2 hit points.

label: Potion of Greater Healing
effects: When drunk, a creature regains 4d4 + 4 hit points.

label: Potion of Superior Healing
effects: When drunk, a creature regains 8d4 + 8 hit points.

label: Potion of Supreme Healing
effects: When drunk, a creature regains 10d4 + 20 hit points.
